content: this super bulky version of the daphne beanie uses size 6 super bulky yarn to create an ultra thick and chunky hat with tons of texture if you re going for that trendy over-sized look this is just the beanie for you the doubled up brim plus a cute faux fur pom pom take this statement piece over the top please note that there is an ad-free pdf version of this pattern available to purchase in my ravelry store it can also be found for free with ads on my blog to view the free version go to https //www caabcrochet com/super-bulky-crochet-hat-pattern/ materials size 6/ super bulky yarn 160-190 yards i used roughly 2 ½ skeins of lion brand hometown usa in durham woods us n/ 9 00 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors final measurements brim/ band 19 -20 circumference height 12 without pom pom and brim unfolded sizing this pattern at gauge will create a size small adult hat if you would like to resize the hat see notes on page 3 at the end of the band directions stitches & abbreviations used yo yarn over skip skip chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet hdss half double slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet dc3tog double_crochet three together fpdc front post double_crochet
